valuation.methodology: Blended cost-to-recreate, execution premium, and comparables.

stakeholders.title: Executive leadership
stakeholders.summary: Frame Annex A55/A56 progress as risk reduction for navigation and monetisation surfaces.
stakeholders.callToAction: Highlight improved click-depth and retention forecasts.

stakeholders.title: Product operations
stakeholders.summary: Surface design dependency QA outcomes and readiness cadences for release managers.
stakeholders.callToAction: Confirm upload readiness pass rate stays above target.

stakeholders.title: Investor relations
stakeholders.summary: Translate navigation remediation into valuation uplift and GTM preparedness.
stakeholders.callToAction: Share scenario planning for return-visit-rate improvements.

messaging.summary: Navigation shells now expose streak depth and recirculation metrics inline, keeping weekly active streakers above the 62% target.
messaging.nextSteps: Ship the community header token audit and publish refreshed screenshots in the Annex A55 playbook.

messaging.summary: Course discovery time has fallen under four minutes after aligning catalog facets with design tokens and explorer analytics.
messaging.nextSteps: Instrument explorer CTA click-through and share adoption telemetry with growth leads.

messaging.summary: Upload readiness pass rate stays above 92% as QA automation verifies tokens, runbook anchors, and asset evidence at each release gate.
messaging.nextSteps: Close the loop on automated annex updates once analytics ingestion ships.
